text: @senatemajldr Yes. Every doctor and nurse is a hero. We will treat them as such and hold multiple parades for them. However, we will charge Trump and you with manslaughter for every COVID19 death. Failed testing, failed supply masks, failed supply respirators, and failed supply beds.
